organization.description:
The Alzheimer's Association, Southeast Florida Chapter is a local 501 (c) 3 organization committed to helping the families in 7 counties: Okeechobee, St. Lucie, Martin, Palm Beach, Broward, Miami-Dade and Monroe counties. The Chapter advances efforts for researching a cure through fundraising with its signature event Walk to End AlzheimerGu00c7u00d6s, and provides support and educational services to more than 150,000 persons with Alzheimer's disease and their families and caregivers locally.

###MON###
organization.name: ALZHEIMER'S ASSOCIATION SOUTHEAST FLORIDA CHAPTER
